item.title: Possible stolen and dumped car, 28th December
item.description:
Possibly stolen and dumped car with all windows wide open no damage at the moment Please advise owner have reported to police but am told it is a council problem It is at the junction of Portland Crescent/portland road

item.title: Cannot get access to use bin, 28th December
item.description:
Good Afternoon Could you kindly ask your workmen to replace the bin after emptying in a way that the public will be able to use it. I witnessed the chap putting the bin back together after removing the bag, I ask him how people was expected to place their rubbish in the bin, for him to just shrug his shoulders. As a litter picking group we would be grateful for your paid workmen not leave us more unwanted litter to pick up. We would be grateful for your workmen to clear up all the rubbish around the bin . Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crayford Way, Barnes Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
